mapper.select: select * from(select a.*,rownum rn from (select cq.cqcontent,cm.cmid coursemid,cm.courseseq,cm.title,u.userid usid,u.uname usname,cq.cqid, (select count(*)from courseanswer ca where ca.cqid=cq.cqid group by cq.cqid) answercount, cq.cqview from coursequestion cq left outer join courseManage cm on cm.cmid=cq.cmid left outer join userinfo u on u.userid=cq.userid where cm.courseid=#{courseid} order by cq.cqtime desc)a where #{pagesize}*#{pagenumber}>=rownum) where rn>#{pagesize}*(#{pagenumber}-1)
select * from coursequestion cq left join coursemanage cm on cq.cmid=cm.cmid where cm.courseid=#{courseid}
select c.*,(select count(*) from courseAnswer a where a.cqid=c.cqid) answercount from courseQuestion c where c.cmid=#{cmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from (select * from coursequestion cq left join coursemanage cm on cq.cmid=cm.cmid where cm.courseid=#{courseid} order by cq.cqtime desc)a where 5>rownum

select cq.cqid cqid,cq.cqcontent cqcontent,cm.title title, cm.cmid cmid,cm.courseid cmcourse,ca.userid causerid, ca.answercontent,ca.answertime,ca.caid,(select uname from userinfo ui where ui.userid=ca.userid)uname, (select ctitle from course ce where ce.courseid=cm.courseid)ctitle, (select photo from userinfo ui where ui.userid=ca.userid)photo from coursequestion cq left outer join courseManage cm on cm.cmid=cq.cmid left outer join userinfo u on u.userid=cq.userid left outer join courseanswer ca on cq.cqid=ca.cqid where cq.cqid=#{cqid} order by cq.cqtime desc
